title: Best predictor of a department annual budget

content.question: Which of the following is the best predictor of the Department of Education’s annual budget?

choices.label: The preferences of the Chair of the Senate Finance Committee
The budget recommendations of the National Education Association
The rate of increase of teachers’ salaries
The number of children entering kindergarten
The size of the previous year’s budget

content.answer: The size of the previous year’s budget
